languages.text: {n}Номос делают шаг к Осколку — и мир будто взрывается в ужасающей круговерти. Вы слышите цвета и видите прикосновения, вы обжигаетесь о лед и горите в морозе. И среди всего этого ясно чувствуется битва, столкновение двух существ — бесконечно древнего и бесконечно юного.{/n}

{n}Nomos steps toward the Shard — and the whole world explodes into a terrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches, ice burns your hands while fire leaves you freezing. And in the midst of this madness, you can clearly sense a battle raging, a clash of two beings, one endlessly ancient and the other endlessly young.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Номос делают шаг к Осколку — и мир будто взрывается в ужасающей круговерти. Вы слышите цвета и видите прикосновения, вы обжигаетесь о лед и горите в морозе. И среди всего этого ясно чувствуется битва, столкновение двух существ — бесконечно древнего и бесконечно юного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos takes a step toward the Shard — and the world seemingly explodes into a horrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches , you get burned on ice and frozen on fire. And in the midst of this whirlwind, you can clearly feel a battle, a clash between the two beings — one endlessly ancient and another endlessly young.{/n}

{n}Nomos takes a step toward the Shard — and the world seemingly explodes into a horrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches , you get burned on ice and frozen on fire. And in the midst of this whirlwind, you can clearly feel a battle, a clash between the two beings — one endlessly ancient and another endlessly young.{/n}

And in the midst of this whirlwind, you can clearly feel a battle, a clash between the two beings: one endlessly ancient and one endlessly young.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nomos fait un pas vers l'Écharde et le monde semble exploser pour se transformer en un épouvantable tourbillon. Vous entendez les couleurs et voyez les contacts physiques ; la glace brûle vos doigts et le feu vous gèle jusqu'aux os. Au cœur de cette folie, vous percevez nettement une bataille, un affrontement entre un être infiniment ancien et un autre infiniment jeune.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos steps toward the Shard — and the whole world explodes into a terrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches, ice burns your hands while fire leaves you freezing. And in the midst of this madness, you can clearly sense a battle raging, a clash of two beings, one endlessly ancient and the other endlessly young.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos fait un pas vers l'Écharde et le monde semble exploser pour se transformer en un épouvantable tourbillon. Vous entendez les couleurs et voyez les contacts physiques ; la glace brûle vos doigts et le feu vous gèle jusqu'aux os. Au cœur de cette folie, vous percevez nettement une bataille, un affrontement entre un être infiniment ancien et un autre infiniment jeune.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nomos da un paso hacia el fragmento... y el mundo entero estalla en un aterrador torbellino. Puedes oír los colores y ver los tactos; el hielo te quema las palmas y el fuego te congela. Y en medio de esta locura puedes sentir con claridad una batalla, un choque entre los dos seres: uno infinitamente antiguo y otro infinitamente joven.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos steps toward the Shard — and the whole world explodes into a terrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches, ice burns your hands while fire leaves you freezing. And in the midst of this madness, you can clearly sense a battle raging, a clash of two beings, one endlessly ancient and the other endlessly young.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos da un paso hacia el fragmento... y el mundo parece estallar en un brutal torbellino. Puedes oír los colores y ver los toques; el hielo te quema y el fuego te congela. Y en medio de este torbellino puedes sentir con claridad una batalla, un choque entre los dos seres: uno infinitamente antiguo y otro infinitamente joven.{/n}

languages.text: {n}诺莫斯朝碎片迈出了一步，整个世界似乎都爆炸了，变成了一场可怕的飓风。你可以听到颜色，看到触碰。你会被冰灼伤，被火冻住。在这疯狂的世界之中，你清楚地感觉到了他们之间的战斗。两种存在之间爆发了剧烈的冲突，其中一方代表着无尽的古老，而另一方则象征着永恒的年轻。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos steps toward the Shard — and the whole world explodes into a terrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches, ice burns your hands while fire leaves you freezing. And in the midst of this madness, you can clearly sense a battle raging, a clash of two beings, one endlessly ancient and the other endlessly young.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}诺莫斯朝碎片迈出了一步，整个世界似乎都爆炸了，变成了一场可怕的飓风。你可以听到颜色，看到触碰。你会被冰灼伤，被火冻住。在这场飓风之中，你清楚地看到了他们之间的战斗。两种存在之间爆发了剧烈的冲突，其中一方代表着无尽的古老，而另一方则象征着永恒的年轻。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nomos geht auf das Fragment zu – und die ganze Welt explodiert in einem entsetzlichen Wirbelwind. Du hörst die Farben und siehst die Berührungen, während Eis deine Hände verbrennt und dich Feuer kalt erschaudern lässt. Und inmitten dieses Wahnsinns spürst du deutlich eine Schlacht, einen Kampf zweier Wesen, von denen das eine unendlich alt und das andere unendlich jung ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos steps toward the Shard — and the whole world explodes into a terrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches, ice burns your hands while fire leaves you freezing. And in the midst of this madness, you can clearly sense a battle raging, a clash of two beings, one endlessly ancient and the other endlessly young.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos macht einen Schritt auf das Fragment zu — und die Welt scheint zu einem grausamen Wirbelwind zu explodieren. Du hörst die Farben und siehst die Berührungen, du wirst von Eis verbrannt und von Feuer erfroren. Und inmitten dieses Wirbelwinds spürst du ganz deutlich eine Schlacht, einen Kampf zwischen den zwei Wesen: eines unendlich alt, eines unendlich jung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ノモスがシャードに向かって一歩を踏み出すと、世界は恐ろしい旋風に巻き込まれる。色彩が聞こえ、手触りが見え、氷が手を焼き、炎があなたの身を凍らせる。そしてこの狂気の渦中で、あなたは激化していく2つの存在の戦い、衝突をはっきりと感じることができた。1つは果てしなく古く、もう1つは果てしなく若いものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos steps toward the Shard — and the whole world explodes into a terrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches, ice burns your hands while fire leaves you freezing. And in the midst of this madness, you can clearly sense a battle raging, a clash of two beings, one endlessly ancient and the other endlessly young.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ノモスがシャードに向かって一歩を踏み出すと、世界は恐ろしい旋風に巻き込まれる。色彩が聞こえ、手触りが見え、氷が手を焼き、炎があなたの身を凍らせる。そしてこの狂気の渦中で、あなたは激化していく2つの存在の戦い、衝突をはっきりと感じることができた。1つは果てしなく古く、もう1つは果てしなく若いものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nomos, Parça'ya doğru bir adım atıyor ve tüm dünya korkunç bir kasırgayla yerle yeksan oluyor. Renkleri duyabiliyor ve hisleri görebiliyorsun. Buz, ellerini yakıyor; ateş seni donduruyor. Tüm bu çılgınlığın ortasında bir savaş yaşandığını hissediyorsun. Biri ebediyen kadim, diğeriyse ebediyen körpe olan iki varlık arasında bir savaş bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos steps toward the Shard — and the whole world explodes into a terrifying whirlwind. You can hear the colours and see the touches, ice burns your hands while fire leaves you freezing. And in the midst of this madness, you can clearly sense a battle raging, a clash of two beings, one endlessly ancient and the other endlessly young.{/n}
